author: Gary_Bricks
title: From what I vaguely remember...
review: I got this set for my birthday six years ago when I was 6 or 7. It was a great lego set, my first set to be exact. It was made up of mainly large pieces, to make it easy for a 5 year old to build. The instructions were not that easy to follow though. I hated the minifig

author: minishark1000
title: Holy Chrome!
review:
Honestly, not much to say about this set, just a basic old 4 Juniors set. The build is really short, consists of only a few pieces each for the cab and trailer.

 

What really makes this set stand out, though, is the chrome! 6 large tanker pieces completely covered in chrome on the sides, it looks amazing when put together! The Octan printing is also a nice touch. It really pains my heart to see such great looking pieces on such a poor model, being blocky and juniorized doesn't do those chrome parts justice. It would look much much better with the tank pieces being utilised in a custom tanker truck MOC, using standard system parts.

 

All in all, a poor set, only those special parts really save it from being an absolute disaster. But after all, it is only a 4 Juniors set... what was I really expecting?
